tag_list: hired-geek, tech, social-media, web-design, web-development, graphic-design, seo, search-enigine-marketing
overview:
I currently work for Auto Credit Express as an SEO section manager. We develop content, deliver tools for our customers, create mobile sites, run multi-scale social networking programs and basically push the boundaries of search engine optimization every day. It’s a great place to work. We have a very talented team. I’m constantly learning new things here. It’s like web development college and I’m getting my PHD in SEO.

With that said, I’ve been designing web sites for over 11 years now. I started off in web marketing and moved into more of a graphic design position. When Macromedia’s Flash came out I became primarily a Flash Programmer/ Designer. I began working with Action script and learned Illustrator so I could manipulate vector files. I also became extremely proficient with Photoshop and did a ton of web design and high end print work.

Later in my profession I started getting more into the heart of coding. I learned HTML, CSS, XML, DHTML and Javascript in the first few years of my programming career. I learned to code cross-browser-compatible, WC3 compliant, XHTML web sites. I began working with PHP & SQL while building user forums and CMS driven web sites and e-commerce sites.

In my spare time I run my blog NateBal.com. Stop by for web site design tutorials and social media marketing tips.

I’m a geek at heart. I was born a .com. I love what I do.
